job.name: Translator Text
job.description: The Microsoft Translator Text API can be seamlessly integrated into your applications, websites, tools, or other solutions to provide multi-language user experiences in more than 60 languages. It can be used on any hardware platform and with any operating system to perform text to text language translation.
